Title: Vanilla Bean Paste
Description: A rich, thick paste that delivers intense vanilla flavor with flecks of real vanilla bean.
Comments: A gourmet ingredient that enhances both classic and inventive bakes.

Title: Gourmet Chocolate Chips
Description: Extra melty and delicious chocolate chips that add the taste of premium box chocolate to homemade recipes.
Comments: Perfect for elevating cookies, brownies, and a variety of chocolate-based treats.

Title: Chai Spice Nut Butter
Description: A decadent blend of peanut and almond butter infused with warm chai spices that bring cozy flavor to baked goods.
Comments: Ideal for adding a spicy twist to cookies, breads, and creative desserts.

Title: Real Maple Syrup
Description: Pure maple syrup with concentrated flavor that sweetens and enriches baked desserts.
Comments: Offers an authentic maple taste far superior to conventional alternatives.

Title: 00 Flour
Description: Extra-fine ground Italian flour that creates a perfectly crispy, airy, and chewy crust, ideal for pizza and artisan breads.
Comments: A must-have for home bakers looking to replicate professional Neapolitan pizza.

Title: Luxardo Cherries
Description: Candied maraschino cherries that offer a rich and luxurious flavor suitable for topping desserts and baked treats.
Comments: Elevates cherry cakes, cookies, and chocolate-dipped confections with a gourmet touch.
